modName: Syna and Myna - Ningheim Race Follower
summary:
Syna and Mina are twin Sister. one of them is a vampire.
.
Syna this is a sleeping giant of the tavern.
Myna this is the castle Volkihar.
descriptionHtml:
Syna and Mina are two twin. one of them is a vampire.
.
Syna this is a sleeping giant of the tavern.
Myna this is the castle Volkihar.

This mod is based on ningheim race. they are both marriable.
Syna is a warrior, it is equipped with ebony armor and a ebony sword .
Myna is a vampire, she is equipped to the vampire royal armor.

This mod requires the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474/?]Ningheim Race[/url]
SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org/)
Race Compatibility (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168)
Ningheim Brows (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411)
And Dawnguard

copy the files to your data folder. 
to uninstall delete file install, especially synafollower.esp

Credits
Hair by HelloSanta  - http://www.loverslab.com/topic/14861-sg-hair-pack-120-hairs-edition/
Horn by volvaga0 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11005/?
Armor first picture - Black Wisteria import by Halofarm - http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/
author: Araknor62
